summary: This is an internal email chain from January 15, 2020, regarding the planning of a visit by the Deputy Attorney General (DAG) to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY). The draft agenda includes a planned update on the Epstein investigation during a meeting with the executive team.

events.title: Planning for DAG Visit to SDNY
events.description: Internal email correspondence planning a future visit by the Deputy Attorney General to the Southern District of New York U.S. Attorney's Office. The draft agenda includes a briefing on the Epstein investigation.

locations: U.S. Attorneys Office for the Southern District of New York One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated January 15, 2020, concerning a planned visit by the Deputy Attorney General (DAG) to the SDNY.
A draft agenda for the visit includes a specific item to update the DAG on the Epstein investigation during a meeting with the executive team.
The correspondence indicates the Epstein investigation was an active and significant matter for the SDNY as of early 2020, warranting high-level DOJ briefing.
